website_summaries.verdict: If you enjoy Monopoly, this board game is a must-play for fans of the Disney film.
pros: The classic Monopoly game with a creative Lion King twist
6 golden player tokens of major characters from the film
cons: A more expensive version of Monopoly

customer_reviews.title: Best Game Ever
customer_reviews.text: I saw this item in one of my "recommended for you" lists or something like that. Amazon thought I'd be interested and sure enough, I WAS!! I pre-ordered this item on the 14th since it wouldn't be available until June 15th and it arrived today...the 18th, first thing in the morning. I'm so excited to just have this game...as a Monopoly collector but also as a huge Disney fan. With the new CGI version of the Lion King releasing this July I am just really excited to have this edition!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Similar looking Player pieces
customer_reviews.text: We love the game but the players are all the same color and some look so similar that it’s hard to distinguish which characters is yours while playing, we kept grabbing Mufasa when our player was Scar because the look so similar. The pieces (grubs and slugs) used to place in the board as owned and property added are too light weight so the move off the board easily if the board is bumped even a little bit which with kids happens often. I feel this was cheaply put together and priced way to high.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Burke

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My daughter is a huge Lion King fan, so I pre-ordered this for her and it just arrived to today. She was very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I have seen.
customer_reviews.text: A very well made item. Token pieces are metal and look premium. The instructions are easy to understand and follow the same concept as the original monopoly. The pride rock sound machine provides a unique excitement for lion king fans. Bought this for my family to play during COVID-19 stay at home, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s the Lion King you have to love it but quality isn’t the greatest
customer_reviews.text: My family loves monopoly and The Lion King so adding this to our collection was a must. We love it but I’m disappointed that the board came warped and idk if it’s the intent but the color for properties are messy/incomplete and the quality of cards are cheap just thick paper, so can easily tear or be damaged. The tokens are awesome and pride rock definitely a cute fun addition. But not worth price if you care about quality. The Five below store sells monopoly for $7 and the board title quality are perfect. But if you don’t care and love Lion King then it’s a cute fun game
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play with the family! A great gift for anyone who likes games and/or Disney's The Lion King. Don't stack anything on top of hit however, it makes sound when the top of the box gets pushed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D. Schutzenhofer

customer_reviews.title: Great twist on a classic
customer_reviews.text: This game was a fun new version of the classic board game. Perfect for a Disney fan. I do wish it came with tray to hold the "Bank" money otherwise it is a great set.
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: No bank. Need more toy cash.
customer_reviews.text: I like all of it besides the fact it did not come with a "bank" place to put all of the money and we ran out of $1M bills so quickly, definitely needed more included.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this when it was on sale and I love it! I am a huge lion king fan and anticipate playing this many times in the years to come with my future children.
customer_reviews.author: Haelee Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Monopoly board games when I purchased the Lion King edition that made me have 4 monopoly games it was brand new everything was in tact and it was delivered with care i love the fact that the driver took a photo of my package being placed on my porch and was he or she marked it as delivered i immediately went downstairs and retrieved it from my porch so thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New item? I think not.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the box looking like a sticker was peeled off the front. Not giftable, not presentable. Also, the box had been open there was no clear wrapping around it. New item appears to be very USED!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Miller

customer_reviews.title: product perfect -
customer_reviews.text: I am Belgian and I ordered the product on amazon.com (USA) the product arrived safely and the price being below the customs fee, I did not have to pay customs! This is great because amazon automatically calculates what customs will cost or not. The product arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. The batteries were already included and the product works fine. The product is of course in English, but it is not important to be able to play it
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Classic addition to monopoly board game!
customer_reviews.text: I collect monopoly games and had to add this to my collection as growing up this was one of my favorite movies. I haven’t gotten to open it yet but from the box I know my family is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: holtmommyto3

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Game
customer_reviews.text: I love monopoly games, we play them all the time, this is is great if you love Disney’s Lion King and it has a button to make noise
customer_reviews.author: Anna Strobel

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this board! Great quality and so cute! We started playing as soon as it came in. One thing I wish it had was the money holder, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: StW

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I personally love the tokens. Lion King is one of my favorite childhood movies, so it was a must have for my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great family game!
customer_reviews.text: Cute game. Was unaware that a piece made noise when I ordered it, so when I picked up the package it started signing the lion king song. Doesn’t have two separate cards for community chest and chance, so that was a little disappointing. Fun game overall and great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: so cute and it was nice to play. love this game and its for kids and adults to have fun with.
customer_reviews.author: Annastashia

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I am a Monopoly collector and had to return this item. It appears it had been returned before. The box was damaged and the big sticker mark on the front ruined its value.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The game is fantastic, but the plastic insert will not last long. The pride rock is so tight in the plastic that you have to take all other things out before you take it or the rest of the contents will be spread over the table. 5* for the game, 1* for the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Makes an awesome gift.
customer_reviews.text: For the lion king fan this is the best gift. Game pieces are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Product was not new
customer_reviews.text: I placed my order for a new board game. When it arrived, there was no damage to the shipping box, but there was damage to the board game box, including a nick in the top of it. The sides had been taped together with scotch tape. Three of the four tab seals had been cut open. And the game board was bent. Made for a tacky gift. Hope there aren't any pieces missing when they play it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Pride Rock will sing you a song when you press a button!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this game I would definitely highly recommend it to any Lion King lovers young and old alike!
customer_reviews.author: Hthr&Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece

customer_reviews.title: Mega Amazing Lion King Monopoly

product_meta.title: Monopoly Game Disney The Lion King Edition Family Board Game
product_meta.description:
Celebrate Simba's journey to become King with this Monopoly: the Lion King edition game. Players move around the game board as their favorite Lion King character, buying as many pride lands themed properties as they can. The game board features artwork inspired by the Lion King motion picture And comes with 6 character tokens. The more A player owns, the more rent they can collect from other players. The last player with money when all other players have gone bankrupt wins! The Lion King themed edition of the Monopoly game makes a great gift for fans of the Disney movie and is a fun choice to play on family game night.



copyright Disney. The Hasbro, Hasbro gaming, Parker brothers, and Monopoly names and logos, The distinctive design of the game board, The four corner Squares, the Mr. Monopoly name and character, As well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. Includes game board, 6 tokens, 28 title Deed cards, 32 Destiny cards, 32 plastic GRUBS, 12 plastic Beetles. 2 dice, pride rock music unit, money pack, and game guide. Ages 8 and up. 2 to 6 players. 2 x 1.5V AAA alkaline batteries required. Demo batteries included.
feature_bullets: Disney the lion King themed game board: this edition of the Monopoly game features a game board with artwork inspired by the lion King movie; players can imagine Simba's journey to become King
Includes 6 character tokens: the Monopoly: Lion King edition game comes with 6 tokens; fans of Disney the lion King can play as Timon, Simba, nala, mufassa, Pumbaa, or Scar
Pride rock plays music: pride rock holds the destiny cards and plays music
Features memorable moments and locations from the movie: the title Deed cards are made up of unforgettable moments and locations from Disney the lion King movie
Includes Destiny cards: Destiny cards replace chance cards and community chest cards in this version of the Monopoly game, and they are inspired by the lion King movie

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars820 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
